ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Intelligence and Bard song effects
ygData.msgSnippet: No surprise there.  I thought that was pretty far fetched. ... From: Rokenn Swiftsong  To:  Sent: Sunday, June 04,
ygData.messageBody:
No surprise there. I thought that was pretty far fetched.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 04, 2000 2:02 AM
Subject: [eqbards] Intelligence and Bard song effects


> I just tested this using our level 38 DoT song, Tuyen's Chant of Flame.
> With a Selo's Drum of the March the song did 126 damage (PvP) regardless
of
> intelligence. I tested it at 85, 116, and 142 intelligence.
